# IPermit2
[Git Source](https://gitlab.com/nomadhub/smart-contracts/blob/9a5d5791960776da326b790b7c18e7af6b05a3aa/contracts/v2/external/@pancakeswap/infinity-periphery/lib/permit2/src/interfaces/IPermit2.sol)

**Inherits:**
[ISignatureTransfer](/contracts/v2/external/@pancakeswap/infinity-periphery/lib/permit2/src/interfaces/ISignatureTransfer.sol/interface.ISignatureTransfer.md), [IAllowanceTransfer](/contracts/v2/external/@pancakeswap/infinity-periphery/lib/permit2/src/interfaces/IAllowanceTransfer.sol/interface.IAllowanceTransfer.md)

Permit2 handles signature-based transfers in SignatureTransfer and allowance-based transfers in AllowanceTransfer.

Users must approve Permit2 before calling any of the transfer functions.
